title: Google\Cloud\Firestore\Admin\V1\Field\IndexConfig
name: IndexConfig
description:
The index configuration for this field.

Generated from protobuf message google.firestore.admin.v1.Field.IndexConfig

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.uses_ancestor_config
params.description: Output only. When true, the Field's index configuration is set from the configuration specified by the ancestor_field. When false, the Field's index configuration is defined explicitly.

params.name: data.ancestor_field
params.description: Output only. Specifies the resource name of the Field from which this field's index configuration is set (when uses_ancestor_config is true), or from which it would be set if this field had no index configuration (when uses_ancestor_config is false).

params.name: data.reverting
params.description: Output only When true, the Field's index configuration is in the process of being reverted. Once complete, the index config will transition to the same state as the field specified by ancestor_field, at which point uses_ancestor_config will be true and reverting will be false.

methods.name: getIndexes
methods.description:
